purpose: AugmentOS provides an operating system for smart glasses, offering users features like AI assistance, notifications, and translation, while enabling developers to create cross-compatible applications.
principle: Built as a modular OS with a focus on compatibility and extensibility for various smart glasses models, leveraging Java as the primary language.
reusability: Supports app development through a unified API, allowing developers to create applications that are compatible across different smart glasses platforms.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for some smart glasses models and feature stability may vary.
name: AugmentOS
description: Smart glasses OS, with dozens of built-in apps. Users get AI assistant, notifications, translation, screen mirror, captions, and more. Devs get to write 1 app that runs on any pair of smart glases.
highlight: Allows developers to write a single app that runs on any pair of smart glasses.
